simula-an algol-based simulation languagethis paper is an introduction to simula aprogramming language designed to provide a systems analyst with unified concepts which facilitate theconcise description of discrete event systems a system description also serves as a source language simulationprogram simula is an extension of algol 60 in which the most important new conceptsis that of quasi-parallel processing.cacm september 1966dahl o j.nygaard k.ca660907 jb march 2 1978 6:21 pm1024 4 13801051 4 13801086 4 13801098 4 13801132 4 13801214 4 13801234 4 13801263 4 13801265 4 13801270 4 13801323 4 13801323 4 13801358 4 13801358 4 13801379 4 13801380 4 13801380 4 13801380 4 13801380 4 13801388 4 13801393 4 13801453 4 13801464 4 13801484 4 13801485 4 13801487 4 13801491 4 13801498 4 13801549 4 13801552 4 13801570 4 13801613 4 13801614 4 13801665 4 13801693 4 13801781 4 13801781 4 13801781 4 13801787 4 13801825 4 13801854 4 13801860 4 13801860 4 13801878 4 13801946 4 13801957 4 13801989 4 13802060 4 13802083 4 13802112 4 13802168 4 13802178 4 13802179 4 13802252 4 13802325 4 13802341 4 13802534 4 13802541 4 13802546 4 13802645 4 13802652 4 13802684 4 13802698 4 13802723 4 13802733 4 13802820 4 13802842 4 13802857 4 13802929 4 13802934 4 1380557 4 13803069 4 13803073 4 13803112 4 13803155 4 1380669 4 1380679 4 1380691 4 1380761 4 1380949 4 1380989 4 13801380 5 13801380 5 13801380 5 13801421 5 13801541 5 13801846 5 13802060 5 13802218 5 13803112 5 13803184 5 1380731 5 1380799 5 1380106 6 13801358 6 13801380 6 13801380 6 13801380 6 13801380 6 13801380 6 13801421 6 13801424 6 13801469 6 13801477 6 13801484 6 13801491 6 13801572 6 13801572 6 13801728 6 13801751 6 13801752 6 13801810 6 13801826 6 1380210 6 13801869 6 13801879 6 13801972 6 13802095 6 13802110 6 13802438 6 13802723 6 13802736 6 13802833 6 13802838 6 1380576 6 1380731 6 1380
